revised_title: Correction: Spark Electromotive Force Measurement in Air between Parallel Metal Plates
tldr: The author corrects a previous statement about the design of the Bute Docks by Mr. Brunel. They also mention the measurement of the electromotive force required to produce a spark in air between parallel metal plates at different distances. The corrected statement clarifies that Mr. Brunel did not design the Bute Docks as a cardan.
